hackathon-description-text: Every year across the globe, children are bought, sold, and used for sex. At any given moment, an estimated 300,000 children, some as young as 11 years old, are at-risk of being commercially sexually exploited in the United States.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Founder and Managing Partner, MLH Group

hackathon-eligibility:
Participants must be high school students
Participants must attend the hackathon in person
hackathon-rules:
All ideas must be original and created by HackECPAT participants.
Participants must be at the Hackathon in-person (no virtual participants).
Projects must be submitted on

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: All members of the group will receive a tablet!
All group members will win a best buy gift card!
All group members will receive ECPAT swag!
